member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Produces an identity matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor(float)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given scalar value.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor(mat3)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given mat3 source matrix (3x3). The matrix elements are filled using corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor(Unigine.mat4)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix by copying a given source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor(Unigine.dmat4)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given dmat4 source matrix (3x4). The matrix elements are filled using corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor(Unigine.vec4,Unigine.vec4,Unigine.vec4,Unigine.vec4)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using given three vec4 vectors.
member.param: Source vector for the first column.
Source vector for the second column.
Source vector for the third column.
Source vector for the fourth column.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor(Unigine.quat)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given source quaternion.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor(mat3,Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given source mat3 matrix (3x3) and a vec3 vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor(Unigine.quat,Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given quaternion and a vec3 vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor(float,int)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given pointer to the source matrix.
member.param: If transpose is 0 (by default), the matrix is specified in the column major style.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.set(int,int,float)
member.summary: Sets a new value of the matrix element specified by row and column.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor(mat2)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given mat2 source matrix (2x2). The matrix elements are filled using corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor(float)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given pointer to the array of float elements.
member.param: Pointer to the array of float elements.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor(float,float,float,float,float,float,float,float,float,float,float,float,float,float,float,float)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given float values.

member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given constant float values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.#ctor(float,ConstexprTag)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the matrix using a given constant float value.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.set(float,int)
member.summary: Sets new matrix values using a pointer to the source matrix.
member.param: If transpose is 0 (by default), the matrix is specified in the column major style.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.set(mat2)
member.summary: Sets new matrix values using a given mat2 source matrix (2x2). The matrix elements are filled using corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.set(mat3,Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Sets new matrix values using a given source mat3 matrix (3x3) and a vec3 vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.set(Unigine.quat,Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Sets new matrix values using a given quaternion and a vec3 vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.set(mat3)
member.summary: Sets new matrix values using a given mat3 source matrix (3x3). The matrix elements are filled using corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.set(Unigine.quat)
member.summary: Sets new matrix values using a given source quaternion.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.set(Unigine.mat4)
member.summary: Sets the matrix equal to the specified source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.set(Unigine.dmat4)
member.summary: Sets new matrix values using a given dmat4 source matrix (3x4). The matrix elements are filled using corresponding elements of the source matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.get(int,int)
member.summary: Returns the reference to the matrix element specified by given row and column.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.get(int,int) const
member.summary: Returns the value of the matrix element specified by given row and column.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.get(float,int) const
member.summary: Fills the destination matrix, specified by the given pointer, with matrix values.
member.param: If transpose is 0 (by default), the matrix is specified in the column major style.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.get
member.summary: Returns the pointer to the matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.get const
member.summary: Returns the constant pointer to the matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.setColumn(int,Unigine.vec4)
member.summary: Sets the specified column of the matrix using a given vec4 vector as a source.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.getColumn(int) const
member.summary: Returns the specified matrix column.
member.returns: The vec4 vector with column values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.setColumn3(int,Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Sets the specified column of the matrix using a given three-component vec3 vector as a source, the last element of the column remains as is.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.getColumn3(int) const
member.summary: Returns the XYZ components of the specified matrix column.
member.returns: The vec3 vector with the first three elements of the specified matrix column.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.setDiagonal(Unigine.vec4)
member.summary: Sets the main diagonal of the matrix using a given vec4 vector as a source.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.getDiagonal const
member.summary: Returns the main diagonal of the matrix.
member.returns: The vec4 vector with the element of the main diagonal.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.setIdentity
member.summary: Sets the matrix equal to the identity matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.setRotate(Unigine.vec3,float)
member.summary: Sets the rotation matrix for a given axis.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.getRotate const
member.summary: Returns the quaternion, representing the rotation part of the matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.setRotateX(float)
member.summary: Sets X rotation matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.setRotateY(float)
member.summary: Sets Y rotation matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.setRotateZ(float)
member.summary: Set Z rotation matrix.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.setRow(int,Unigine.vec4)
member.summary: Sets the specified row of the matrix using a given vec4 vector as a source.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.getRow(int) const
member.summary: Returns the specified matrix row.
member.returns: The vec4 vector with row values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.setRow3(int,Unigine.vec3)
member.summary: Sets the specified row of the matrix using a given three-component vec3 vector as a source, the last element of the row remains as is.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.getRow3(int) const
member.summary: Returns the first three elements of the specified matrix row.
member.returns: The vec3 vector with the first three elements of the specified matrix row.

member.summary: Fills the scaling matrix using a given vec3 source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.getScale const

member.summary: Fills the translation matrix using a given vec3 source vector.

member.name: M:Unigine.Math.mat4.getTranslate const
member.summary: Returns the three-component vec3 vector, representing the translation part of the matrix.
member.returns: Three-component vector with the translation part of the matrix.

member.summary: Sets all matrix elements equal to 0.
